verses.verse: (A Song, a Psalm of David.) My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>steadfast,<s%> O <S%H430>God;<s%> I will <S%H7891>sing,<s%> I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises,<s%> <S%H637>even<s%> with my <S%H9202>soul.<s%>
I will <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> And I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to Thee among the <S%H3816>nations.<s%>
For Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> And Thy <S%H571>truth<s%> [reaches] to the <S%H7834>skies.<s%>
Be <S%H7311>exalted,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> And Thy <S%H9202>glory<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
That Thy <S%H3039>beloved<s%> may be <S%H2502>delivered,<s%> <S%H3467>Save<s%> with Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and <S%H6030>answer<s%> me!

<S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in His <S%H6944>holiness:<s%> "I will <S%H5937>exult,<s%> I will <S%H2505>portion<s%> out <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> And <S%H4058>measure<s%> out the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth.<s%>
<S%H1568>"Gilead<s%> is Mine, <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> is Mine; <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> also is the <S%H4581>helmet<s%> of My <S%H7218>head;<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is My <S%H2710>scepter.<s%>

<S%H4124>"Moab<s%> is My <S%H7366>washbowl<s%><S%H5518>;<s%> <S%H5921>Over<s%> <S%H9000>Edom<s%> I shall <S%H7993>throw<s%> My <S%H5275>shoe;<s%> <S%H5921>Over<s%> <S%H6429>Philistia<s%> I will <S%H7321>shout<s%> <S%H7321>aloud.<s%>"
<S%H4310>Who<s%> will <S%H2986>bring<s%> me into the <S%H4013>besieged<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> will <S%H5148>lead<s%> me to <S%H9000>Edom<s%>?
Hast not Thou Thyself, O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2186>rejected<s%> us? And wilt Thou not <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> with our <S%H6635>armies,<s%> O <S%H430>God<s%>?
Oh <S%H3051>give<s%> us <S%H5833>help<s%> <S%H4480>against<s%> the <S%H6862>adversary,<s%> For <S%H8668>deliverance<s%> by <S%H120>man<s%> is in <S%H7723>vain.<s%>
Through <S%H430>God<s%> we shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly;<s%> And it is He who will <S%H947>tread<s%> <S%H947>down<s%> our <S%H6862>adversaries.<s%>
